module: Module-level comment: The altera_up_av_config_auto_init_ob_de2i_150 module initializes audio and video settings for the DE2i-150 FPGA using two sub-modules for individual configurations. It reads configuration data via a 6-bit address input (`rom_address`) and outputs a 27-bit combined data (`rom_data`), formed by logically ORing the outputs from the audio (`audio_rom_data`) and video (`video_rom_data`) configuration sub-modules. This process ensures comprehensive AV setup on the FPGA.
